member.name: IImageRecompress.RecompressImage
member.summary: Recompresses an image. Implemented in anImageRecompress object, this method accepts x and y dimensions with a designation of quality. The method creates a stream containing the new image that has been recompressed to the specified size.
member.param: A pointer to the object containing the stream of the image to read.
The x dimension of the image to return.
The y dimension of the image to return.
An indication of recompression quality that can range from 0 to 100.
A pointer to an interface on the object that contains the stream to be written to.
The address of an interface pointer variable that receives the output stream written to.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise. If the image in the input stream is less than the size specified bycx andcy, then S_FALSE is returned.

member.name: IImageRecompress
member.summary: Exposes a method that recompress images.
